entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parent 06:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
